channel.title: Between on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race
channel.description: Recent content in Between on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race

item.title: UN aid convoy reaches Syria’s Ain al-Arab as truce between army, SDF holds
item.description: Convoy carrying food and fuel reaches Kurdish-majority town, also known as Kobane, in Aleppo province.

item.title: Zelenskyy touts ‘constructive’ trilateral talks between the US, Russia and Ukraine in Abu Dhabi
item.description: Ukraine's Zelenskyy calls recent US-Russia-Ukraine talks in Abu Dhabi "constructive," marking potential breakthrough in diplomatic efforts to end the war.
